channel.title: crashing
channel.description: hello dear gamers. i made an account here for the reason that i love this game but some crap happend. i almost completed it and i need to defend the scientist that will open the portal to xen. but when i kill one of those flying alien controllers my game crashes pls help me fix this. thx, :slight_smile:

hello dear gamers.

but when i kill one of those flying alien controllers my game crashes pls help me fix this.
thx,
